name: Piecework Payment
query:
SELECT  e.department AS "Department:Link/Department:200",
        IFNULL(a.employee_name,'TOTAL',a.employee_name) AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
        sum(a.amount) AS "Gross:Currency:150",
        sum(a.amount) * 0.1 AS "NSSF:Currency:150",        
        sum(a.amount) * 0.9 AS "Net:Currency:150"
FROM `tabAdditional Salary` a LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON a.employee = e.name
WHERE a.payroll_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
AND a.salary_component = 'Piecework'
GROUP BY e.department, a.employee_name WITH ROLLUP
